issue.title: [Flight][C++] Flight server segfaults when port is in use
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4984](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4984). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a Flight server tries to bind to a port in use, it segfaults (as impl_->server_ will be nullptr).
